short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a virtual mute button to your system tray to quickly mute Zoom, Teams, and Meet. Requires the free mütesync app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The mütesync Chrome Extension allows you to mute/unmute Google Meet, Zoom, and other meeting tools directly from an icon that appears in your System Tray (Windows) or Menu Bar (Mac).  In addition, the virtual mute button stays in sync. So even if you mute from the video conferencing app, use a hotkey, or the host mutes you, the virtual mute button will stay in sync. 

This Chrome extension also enables the mütesync physical mute button to work with the video conferencing tools mentioned above. Visit www.mutesync.com to learn more.

You MUST also have the mütesync free virtual mute button app for this extension to work properly. You can download the mütesync app for Mac or Windows for free at: www.mutesync.com/download
